IP_LDA_NOADDSINGLE.name: IP_LDA_NOADDSINGLE
IP_LDA_NOADDSINGLE.description: This table stores LDA information for a patient. A record is created in LDA for insertion of every line, drain, airway, or wound for a patient, as well as entering a trip into a patient's travel history. The no-add information for this LDA is stored in the table.

columns.name: IP_LDA_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the Lines/Drains/Airways (LDA) record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the ID of the patient to which this line record was added.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: This item stores the contact serial number of the encounter in which the record was created.

columns.name: FLO_MEAS_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Flowsheet ID that defines the structure of this record. It is the flowsheet group that is used to define the set of rows for the Line/Drain/Airway (LDA).

columns.name: FLO_MEAS_ID_DISP_NAME
columns.description: The display name given to the flowsheet group/row.

columns.name: FSD_ID
columns.description: This item stores the flowsheet data (FSD) ID of the record that has information about the properties of the line/drain/airway (LDA).

columns.name: DESCRIPTION
columns.description: This item stores the name/description of the line/drain.

columns.name: PROPERTIES_DISPLAY
columns.description: Stores the properties display string to be displayed in Doc Flowsheets and Reports.

columns.name: LDA_GROUP_CDR
columns.description: This column stores the contact date real of the Line/Drain/Airway (LDA) Group contact that created this LDA.  This column is stored in Epic's datetime (DTE) format.

columns.name: TRIP_REGION_ID
columns.description: Represents where the patient traveled for this trip

columns.name: TRIP_REGION_ID_GEO_REGION_NAME
columns.description: The record name for the geographical region record.

columns.name: TRIP_BEGIN_DATE
columns.description: Represents when a patient began their trip

columns.name: TRIP_END_DATE
columns.description: Represents the end of this patient trip

columns.name: TRIP_DATE_APPROX_C_NAME
columns.description: Whether the dates for this trip are exact or approximate

columns.name: RECORDED_DTTM
columns.description: The recorded time used in IP_FLWSHT_MEAS for storing the property data for this LDA.
